name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Value Engineer, I leverage my expertise in strategic consulting, pre-sales, and business transformation to drive impactful business outcomes. With over 9 years of comprehensive experience, I excel in financial modeling, ROI, NPV, and TCO analyses, enabling organizations to make informed decisions. My strength in business process analysis and workshop facilitation allows me to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams. Additionally, I possess strong communication, storytelling, and presentation skills to articulate technical concepts clearly. My commitment to design thinking enhances my approach to solving complex business challenges, ensuring that I deliver tailored solutions that prioritize user experience and performance.
